sentences.en: " It was Wen - wan's old work that was copied.
sentences.cn: “ 录的说是文 纨 小姐的旧作.

sentences.en: " Wen - wan, don't tell him,'said Hsin - mei in a haughty, jealous tone.
sentences.cn: 辛楣 又骄又妒道:“文纨, 不要告诉他. ”

sentences.en: All she could manage was a thin, wan smile.
sentences.cn: 她只能挤出一丝疲惫的笑容。

sentences.en: By thus besmirching Su Wen - wan , the two made up.
sentences.cn: 这样作践着苏文 纨, 他们俩言归于好.

sentences.en: Despite his weariness, Brand mustered a wan smile.
sentences.cn: 虽然精疲力竭，布兰德还是无力地笑了笑。
她那苍白, 轻藐的嘴嫣然一笑.

sentences.en: Ming - feng whispered a few words in Wan - erh's ear.
sentences.cn: 鸣凤半害羞地在婉儿的耳边说了一句话.

sentences.en: Miss Wen - wan , a mother always thinks her son isn't fat enough.
sentences.cn: 文 纨 小姐, 做母亲的人总觉得儿子不够胖的.
她看上去既疲乏又虚弱.

sentences.en: Wan - erh asked Ming - feng softly. She spoke more slowly than usual.
sentences.cn: 婉儿用更低的声音问 鸣凤 道,声音很温和,比她平时说话慢了些.

sentences.en: Wan - erh's anger mounted , but there was misery in her voice.
sentences.cn: 婉儿更气了, 声音里充满了苦恼.

sentences.en: Wen - wan clapped her hands and said, " Well, so you can't say it.
sentences.cn: 文 纨 拍手道: “ 好! 你说不出来了.

sentences.en: Wen - wan said, " Oh , but he has official business keeping him here!
sentences.cn: 文纨道: “ 他在这儿有公事分不开身 呀 !

words.tran_cn: 渐亏的；逐渐减弱或变小的
衰落；变小；亏缺；退潮；消逝

phrases.tran_cn: 荃湾区（香港首个新市镇）

trans.tran_cn: 苍白的，没有血色的，病弱的，软弱无力的，<古>暗淡的，阴暗的
